mapper.insert: insert into SYSTEM_PARAMETER (PARAMETER_ID, MYID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIPTION, STATE, EDITOR, EDITOR_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER) values (#{parameterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{myid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastmod,jdbcType=DATE}, #{creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select PARAMETER_ID, MYID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIPTION, STATE, EDITOR, EDITOR_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_PARAMETER WHERE 1=1 ${_parameter}

select PARAMETER_ID, MYID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIPTION, STATE, EDITOR, EDITOR_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_PARAMETER
WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' ${_parameter}
select DISTINCT GROUP_TYPE from SYSTEM_PARAMETER WHERE STATUS='A'

select PARAMETER_ID, MYID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIPTION, STATE, EDITOR, EDITOR_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_PARAMETER WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' AND PARAMETER_ID= #{parameterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select PARAMETER_ID, MYID, NAME, VALUE, DESCRIPTION, STATE, EDITOR, EDITOR_TYPE, GROUP_TYPE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER from SYSTEM_PARAMETER WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS='A' AND STATE='Y' AND MYID= #{myid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
